channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft Forefront Endpoint Protection
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft Forefront Endpoint Protection

item.title: CVE-2020-1163|2024-08-04T06:25:01.257Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20forefront%20endpoint%20protection
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists in Windows Defender that leads arbitrary file deletion on the system.To exploit the vulnerability, an attacker would first have to log on to the system, aka 'Microsoft Windows Defender Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2020-1170.

item.title: CVE-2020-1170|2024-08-04T06:25:01.220Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20forefront%20endpoint%20protection
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists in Windows Defender that leads arbitrary file deletion on the system.To exploit the vulnerability, an attacker would first have to log on to the system, aka 'Microsoft Windows Defender Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2020-1163.

item.title: CVE-2020-1461|2024-08-04T06:39:10.405Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20forefront%20endpoint%20protection
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when the MpSigStub.exe for Defender allows file deletion in arbitrary locations.To exploit the vulnerability, an attacker would first have to log on to the system, aka 'Microsoft Defender Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2020-1002|2024-08-04T06:24:59.503Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20forefront%20endpoint%20protection
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when the MpSigStub.exe for Defender allows file deletion in arbitrary locations.To exploit the vulnerability, an attacker would first have to log on to the system, aka 'Microsoft Defender Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability'.
